Mickley, Northumberland, England, UK 1st prize £10 and 2nd prize £2.10s. divided between Westwood and Throckley. 3rd prize £1.10s. 4th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Westwood, 2nd (10s.) Backworth Institute. 7 bands competed.
